name: OTTAA Project
description: First AI based, predictive AAC platform for people with speech impairment

SDGs.evidenceText: OTTAA is fully aligned with the guidelines of #Envision2030, promoting and raising awareness of disability overall and how people with disabilities can reach SDG goals in general.   Focusing on good health and well-being, OTTAA as a support communication device, empowers people with speech impairments to make their own decisions regarding their health and medical treatments, easing diagnostics by communicating directly and not relying on a caregiver's opinion is key to achieve an overall sense of well-being. OTTAA provides several pictograms and pre-set sentences to ease communication in a medical setting.

OTTAA is fully aligned with the guidelines of #Envision2030, promoting and raising awareness of disability overall and how people with disabilities can reach SDG goals in general.  By giving someone a voice, allowing them to speak for themselves & to decide, is the most powerful thing that can happen to them, by using OTTAA they can express their political views, their needs and opinions allowing them to participate in their society.

NonPII.nonPIIAccessMechanism: Data can be transfered using JSON format. Reference : https://ottaa-project.github.io/docs/techno

standardsList: HTTPS for secure communicate over networks
OAuth 2 for authentication and user authorization
UTF-8 for string localization and internalization
JSON for database structure and data transfer
PNG & Webp for images and pictograms

preventHarm.additionalInfoMechanismProcessesPolicies: We have requested a revision to ANMAT (FDA equivalent in Argentina) to certify this project does not harm and is safe to use. The revision was successfully approved.
